title: I absolutely love Camille's login music
body: I have always liked the login music that Riot creates, especially the Star Guardians one, but I'm absolutely in love with Camillie's. I just wanted to say thank you to the people that put so much effort into creating/composing it. It definitely paid off.

replies.body:
Thanks so much!
I had a great time composing her theme. She's a very inspiring champ.
how do u guys come up with ideas of the type of music it is going to be

It depends. Sometimes we have an idea right away just by looking at the art, gameplay, and reading the lore. Sometimes it gets a little more complicated if the champ has different facets that need to be represented but still coexist together. If it's a style that we're not familiar with, we'll spend time immersing ourselves in that genre and try to internalize what we've learned and create something original within that style.
For Camille the first thing I went for was the harpsichord to represent her aristocratic side. From there the violin line followed. I spent a while playing with the balance of acoustic vs electronic instruments. There were some iterations where there was too much electronic and while it sounded cool it felt too much like the Project universe vs Piltover. I also took into account the comic and used all that to draw ideas from.
